description:
Zoro is captured by Fishman Arlong and learns a shocking secret about Nami. Unable to believe his ears, he puts the navigator to the ultimate test.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cocoyashi Mura no Majo! Arlong no Onna Kanbu
La sorcière du village de Cocoyashi ! La dirigeante du clan Arlong
Witch of Cocoyashi Village! Arlong`s Female Leader!
Ведьма деревни Кокояси! Девушка из штаба Арлонга
ผู้ช่วยของอาร์ลอง
ココヤシ村の魔女! アーロンの女幹部
